name: Personal Growth - MFGJ
description:
A small game about a sunflower seed growing into a sunflower. Collect water drops to grow and meet up with your new friend

Made for the "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023"

Credits:

Music by "Not Jam" - track 11 "Credits Theme [Klepto-Linda]"

https://not-jam.itch.io/not-jam-music-pack

Font "Upheaval"

https://www.dafont.com/upheaval.font

The rest of the assets were made by me.

There is no Mac export, Sorry.
